entities.name: GITHUB, INC.
entities.description: GitHub, Inc. was acquired by the company in October 2018 for $7.5 billion.

entities.name: ZENIMAX MEDIA INC.
entities.description: ZeniMax Media Inc. was acquired by the company in March 2021 for $8.1 billion.

entities.name: NUANCE COMMUNICATIONS, INC.
entities.description: Nuance Communications, Inc. was announced to be acquired by the company in April 2021 for $19.7 billion.

relationships.relationship_description: The company acquired GitHub, Inc. in October 2018 for $7.5 billion.
The company acquired ZeniMax Media Inc. in March 2021 for $8.1 billion.
The company announced a definitive agreement to acquire Nuance Communications, Inc. in April 2021 for $19.7 billion.
